content:
Has anyone used lean-gptf?
https://github.com/jesse-michael-han/lean-gptf

I'm having a hard time configuring the OpenAI API key and I'm not even sure whether it's working correctly... Can I just use the same API as that of GPT-3?
There is a stream dedicated to lean-gptf, you can ask there.
I can move you message there if you wish
